name: ABYSS
description: ABYSS is a multiplayer SURVIVAL game that takes place in the vicinity of an abandoned city. The locals called this place "the Abyss".
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1) Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8120 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB или AMD HD 6850 с 1GB памяти DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: Совместимая с DX11
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit (Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1) Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 760 или AMD HD 8800 с 4GB памяти DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: Совместимая с DX11
